reviewText: This is a strange movie, but having said that, it will definitely keep your attention. A friend gave me this as a gift so I wasn't sure what to expect, but after watching I see why she gave it to me. Very entertaining.
Title: Lady Of The Dark: Genesis Of The Serpent Vampire

reviewText: Melanie Denholme is definitely beginning to grow on me, or maybe it's just a rash.  So why do bad things always happen to pretty girls?  In this case, one snakebite leads poor Melanie down a very dark path involving continuous and seriously sensual writhing, a skill she excels at, along with some effective fem-dom action.  A one-location, one actress tour-de-force, this reminded me a lot of Polanski's Repulsion.  This was a tough assignment, carrying an entire film alone, but lucky for the filmmakers and for us, Melanie is entirely up to the task.
summary: Melanie Denholme - star of the future
Title: Lady Of The Dark: Genesis Of The Serpent Vampire

reviewText: Twilight on steroids--this chick is off the hook! All the grown-up vampire lovers out there will enjoy this racy response to the blood-sucking craze. Sexy, scary and mostly a feast for the eyes, this is not your vampire romance flick!
Title: Lady Of The Dark: Genesis Of The Serpent Vampire

reviewText: This IS a weird movie.  But Denholm does SUCH a great job, you're hooked, and the weirdness actually leaves you really wanting to know what could possibly happen next!  Really original movie here.  Creepy and great for a date night in.
Title: Lady Of The Dark: Genesis Of The Serpent Vampire

reviewText: SUCH an original idea!  The transformation of Eve from normal, rather boring lady to badass killing monster should go down in cinematic history as one of the greatest movie moments of all time.  It's bizarre, but captivating!
Title: Lady Of The Dark: Genesis Of The Serpent Vampire

reviewText: There Is Hot vampire chicks in this movie  emmmm...I like what ive seen so far from this guy its weird stuff.
Title: Lady Of The Dark: Genesis Of The Serpent Vampire
